panelState.title: Panel State
panelState.description: Select your preference for the state of the main panel when you are logged into Earthdata Search. Collapsed maximizes usable map space on the initial load. Open allows for panel and map interactions. Full Width uses the full width of your browser for search results.

collectionListView.title: Collection Search Results View
collectionListView.description: Set a default view for collection search results.

granuleListView.title: Granule Search Results View
granuleListView.description: Set a default view for granule search results.
